mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product p LEFT JOIN productFile pf ON p.pCode = pf.pCode LEFT JOIN category c ON p.cgNo = c.cgNo WHERE p.pName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') AND p.pDeleted = 0 OR p.pBrandName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') OR c.cgName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') AND p.pDeleted = 0;
